field_mapping.label: Field Mapping
field_mapping.help: List of the Table Fields/Columns. Input for this field is in JSON format {"(field_name)" : {"source_field" : "value", "data_type": "value", "format": "value"}}. field_name will be the name of the column in the MsSQL Table, source_field (required) value will be the name of the field in the JSON Data passed to the plugin, data_type (optional) there are 5 available data types that will convert data to it's proper type before saving we have String, Integer, Float, Boolean and DateTime, format is only available for DateTime data_type this will allow users to format the date/time before saving i.e. (YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss) kindly refer to the MomentJS docs for more details.
